description: The energy source for all electricity generated in Maryland from 1990 through 2012. Numbers are in megawatt-hours (MWh). Note that Maryland imports a certain percentage of its electricity from out-of-state generators (around 45 percent in 2012). Data comes from the U.S. Energy Information Administration.

name: Electricity Generation By Source In Maryland
